text:
@SethAbramson For Years, #Republicans say Sanctity of Life & STOP murdering babies. 

Where are #Conservatives TODAY on the 126,000+ DEAD #Americans due to #Trump *FAILED* response to #COVID19 ???!! 

Or the #KidsInCages ??!!  Remember Them?? 

#VoteBidenToSaveAmerica
